about_the_game:
About This Game

“Return to LI World” is a humorous PRG round combat game with funny elements. In the game, you need to look for your own suitable teammates with girl QiQI. Through severe hammer, you will gradually turn from small mercenary to top mercenary on the mainland, buy own house to make delicious cooking, forge iron, create powerful equipment, talk with girls and realize their dreams to for their favors. However, it’s not easy to get their favors, as you are not good enough with current state!
So, improve your power to combat with monsters and become the strongest man in the LI world!

Game features

nine heroines – each heroine has her own special background story and unknown secret, just explore their inner secret, open their heart and their will be different endings for you to discover.

Turn-based combat

With simple operation, players can fully think about matching role and combine skills with teammates.
Rich interpersonal relationships
Through interaction with npc, enhance emotional base for various benefits. Different conversations affect task course, earning and rare items.
process, income and rare items.

Exploration map with high degree of freedom

Once out of novice village, players can roam the entire game world. Treasure hunting? Collecting? Challenge guard BOSS of each map.

Rich storylines

As long as 20 hours of main plot, the plot of each heroine determines the endings and tasks.

Abundant equipment

Through combating with monsters and tasks, get 400+ equipment and suitable for those players enjoying equipment collection.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content, General Mature Content
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

detailed_description:
About This Game

“Return to LI World” is a humorous PRG round combat game with funny elements. In the game, you need to look for your own suitable teammates with girl QiQI. Through severe hammer, you will gradually turn from small mercenary to top mercenary on the mainland, buy own house to make delicious cooking, forge iron, create powerful equipment, talk with girls and realize their dreams to for their favors. However, it’s not easy to get their favors, as you are not good enough with current state!
So, improve your power to combat with monsters and become the strongest man in the LI world!

Game features

nine heroines – each heroine has her own special background story and unknown secret, just explore their inner secret, open their heart and their will be different endings for you to discover.

Turn-based combat

With simple operation, players can fully think about matching role and combine skills with teammates.
Rich interpersonal relationships
Through interaction with npc, enhance emotional base for various benefits. Different conversations affect task course, earning and rare items.
process, income and rare items.

Exploration map with high degree of freedom

Once out of novice village, players can roam the entire game world. Treasure hunting? Collecting? Challenge guard BOSS of each map.

Rich storylines

As long as 20 hours of main plot, the plot of each heroine determines the endings and tasks.

Abundant equipment

Through combating with monsters and tasks, get 400+ equipment and suitable for those players enjoying equipment collection.
legal_notice:
All characters in the game are adults over 18 years old.
“Return to LI World” is a romantic PRG where players will see some suggestive dialogues. Please note that all CG in the game do not contain any direct body parts or nudity. However, this game can be modified by the players’ own mods and this disclaimer does not apply to the modified contents.
name: 重回哩世界

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: In the magic PRG with round combat, the adolescent Ming passes through LI world and meet with the girl Qiqi and help each other. From the beginning, they fight for survival and then they convene teammates to become top mercenary on the mainland.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support
